data.name: WarpedSpace
data.detailed_description:
WarpedSpace is an sci-fi survival adventure game set in deep space. A massive, open environment full of wonder and peril awaits you!

Dive Into a Vast Space Adventure


You awake in space, and the only way to go is everywhere!
Both on foot and in your spacecraft explore "open world" space and discover a mix of environments.
WarpedSpace's environments range from dry desserts to treacherous ice island planets, alien outposts asteroid belts and more. Manage your food, oxygen and water supply as you explore space and land, discovering outposts, wrecks and bases throughout the system. You may discover some life: Some times helpful, often harmful.

Tell me more

Awoken from stasis into an unexpected and hostile environment, the traveler must explore the mysteries of WarpedSpace.
WarpedSpace creates environments that provide opportunities to immerse yourself in a Sci-Fi world like no other.

Exploration is key in this open-world adventure and leaving the comforts of your ship to explore caves and wrecks may result in untold rewards.
To bring the world to life-- Creatures may find your ship more appetizing than you-- but you and your ship may not always be the most enticing items on the menu.

Organic and inorganic lifeforms with needs or goals may ignore you unless you get in their way. Not everything is out to kill you so choose your actions wisely. Encounters with hostile forces may be too much to handle so escape may be a smarter and more thrilling strategy than expected.

Being mindful of where you leave your ship will play a critical role when a quick escape is key. Masking or lowering your ship's signature will be useful when operating in more hostile areas and can protect against creatures that might be drawn to it.

Explore, hunt, harvest, build and upgrade to survive and uncover the mysteries of WarpedSpace.

Wake up, traveler. THEY are coming!

Want to make suggestions ?

Then join our Discord https://discord.gg/3mtMgyt

Latest Features Added :
  • Tractor Beams for Ships
  • Per Environment Gravity
  • Oxygen
  • TrackIR Support

Features being Developed

  • Exploration Explore an open world environment on foot, EVA or in your ship.
  • Environments Environments range from asteroid belts, wrecks, gas clouds, alien outposts and mini planetoids with different biomes to explore
  • FPS Combat Not everywhere is safe find and upgrade a weapon or two as you explore the different environments and points of interest
  • Space Combat Encounter "them" in space, be prepared to fight, run and hide, you may not always be as equipped as your would like.
  • Base Building With the Recent Addition of Base Building you now have the opportunity to set up camp and live among the star as you see fit.
    Not all areas are as easy to survive in as others....
  • Story What happened to the planets? Who is with you in this system? Enjoy the open world or settle down it's up to you how much of the mystery you discover.
  • Repair Maintain your ship, you'll have to find a safe place to Eva and restore your ship to battle ready status
  • Salvage Salvage material as you explore to build your base or repair your ship
  • Survival It is still to early to tell what level of survival we will implement at this time. Suggestions are welcome.

Explore the mystery of this Space Adventure

What happened to the planets? Who is with you in this system? Discover outposts underground bases Alien tech and more.

data.short_description: WarpedSpace is an sci-fi survival adventure game set in deep space. A massive, open environment full of wonder and peril awaits you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.4 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent - This includes most GPUs scoring greater than 950 points in the 3DMark Fire Strike benchmark
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specifications may change during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti or equivalent, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specifications may change during development
